quote: It's not about what I want anymore, Mitsy. It's about making the best of what I have.
author: Pearl, Pearl (2022)

quote: You're a fraud, Helen! You're a walking lie and I can see right... THROUGH YOU!
author: Madeline Ashton, Death Becomes Her (1992)

quote: This is the skin of a killer, Bella
author: Edward Cullen, Twilight (2008)
